Except Battery (Typical 3880mah), Everything is Top Notch for the priceI am Normal Dual sim user (Airtel and Jio 5G), and i am getting battery backup of approx 4hrs, So i guess you should get Powerbank in your pocket to keep this Beast AliveMore Horsepower = More Fuel Consumption :)READ MORE

Great compact and light weight phone. The edges are not rounded hence while holding the phone bare will feel uncomfortable. But getting a good case solves that. Battery is decent and not recommended for heavy users. Charging takes about 45min to 1 hour to go from 10 to 85%. Display and touch is awesome as expected from Samsung. Camera is good if not great (I used to have pixel earlier so feeling it). User interface and features are great as well. overall an amazing deal at 38.5k.READ MORE
Great mobile phone with awesome camera and processor only a little battery is compromised but it is valid also as size is 6.2 inchesREAD MORE

Coming from samsung M34, this feels awesome to use. Performance even in light profile is super good. Adreno750 gpu can run most games in playstore. Heavy usage will drain battery life similar to a powerful gaming laptop. However, Light, mixed usage will get you by one day.The design and size is super sexy. As of November 2025, S25 has better SoC but this S24 is super value for money, you're are getting 95% of S25.READ MORE
